text: “Buckle up everybody, we’re in for a fun ride.
It’s time for another adventure!”
“Fasten your seatbelts everyone for ‘wheels on the bus’....
Hee haw!
The wheels on the bus go round and round,
Round and round, round and round.
The wheels on the bus go round and round,
All through the town.
“Let’s play a game everybody,
Look out the window. i spy with my little eye something beginning with C”
“Ohh ooh i know its a cloud!!”
“That’s right”
The wheels on the bus fly up in the clouds
Up in the clouds, up in the clouds
The wheels on the bus fly up in the clouds
High above the town
Ok, my turn …I spy with my little eye something beginning with H”
Oh oh i know, i know….its a horn!!
“That’s right buggy!
The horn on the bus goes ‘beep beep beep’
‘Beep beep beep’, ‘beep beep beep’
The horn on the bus goes ‘beep beep beep’
All through the town.
“Now my turn…i spy with my little eye
something falling down that begins with W”.
“It’s a wheel”.

The kids on the bus jump up and down 
 woo
Up and down (woo) up and down (woo)

The kids on the bus jump up and down 
 woo
All through the town.
“i spy with my little eye something beginning with s”
“I know…i know….it’s school
The kids on the bus say we love school
We love school, we love school
The kids on the bus say we love school
All through the town.
I spy with my little eye something beginning with….F”
Family & friends
“yay! hee haw
The wheels on the bus go round and round,
Round and round, round and round.
The wheels on the bus go round and round,
All through the town.
